Renders species on the given view

start_optimization(view, species_dict, detach)[source]¶

Gets the optimization parameters, start the OptimizationWorker that generates the species placement

Parameters

  • view – QGraphicsView object where the species will be rendered

  • species_dict – species to be optimized

  • detach – flag denoting if the optimization was started by clicking on network node (the species is rendered onto a detached window)

Returns
